caption:
This photograph captures a coastal scene with a rugged, natural backdrop. In the foreground, there is a fenced-off area with wooden posts and rails. To the right, a sign is visible stating "RAW SEWAGE NO FISH QUARANTINED," indicating environmental or health concerns in the area. The middle ground of the photo shows two people descending along a grass-covered path towards the beach. Both individuals are dressed in casual outdoor attire suitable for a hike or a walk on the beach, one wearing a pink jacket.

In the background, the dynamic coastal landscape features turbulent ocean waves hitting the shore, creating white froth and spray. A steep, rocky hillside borders the beach, covered with green vegetation which suggests a resilient natural environs despite the warning sign about contamination. The scene is set under a bright, clear blue sky which adds a vivid contrast to the darker tones of the sea and cliff. The overall composition of the image blends human activity with natural elements, underlined by the environmental caution conveyed through the signage.
title: Mendocino beach.  Swimming is banned because of raw sewage pollution.  (from the sites exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11.)
